alert.note: Alert for Knott; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 04 at 4:22PM EDT until September 04 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, Breathitt, Knott and Perry. * WHEN...Until 615 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Excessive runoff will cause minor flooding of creeks and streams, roads, and roadside culverts. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hazard, Noble, Rowdy, Buck, Hardshell, Ary, Decoy, Dice, Ned, Daisydell, Talcum, Sikes, Lunah, Press, Lambric, Camp Lewis, Rousseau and Stevenson.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
